text: Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ apaniba amadaghtɨ, me izɨva Judan gumazamizibar suigh me iniam, mati gumazim uan ivem akunigha osirir avɨriba ini. Eghtɨ gɨn kɨ uam apanir igharaziba ameghtɨ, me mangɨ gumazamizir mɨghsɨabar mongeziba, ko dagɨar toribar mongeziba, buri men suigham, mati gumazim ruarimɨn asɨziba buria dar suisi.
